amendment.description: To require additional elements in the report on the plan on the privatization of the defense commissary system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1511 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1511 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3755-3756; text: CR S3756) To require additional elements in the report on the plan on the privatization of the defense commissary system.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1511 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1511 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 1463.
